# resolve(in:)

**Instance Method**

Evaluates this font to a resolved font given the current context.

## Declaration

```swift
func resolve(in context: Font.Context) -> Font.Resolved
```

## Discussion

The system resolves a font’s value at the time it uses the font in a given environment’s context because [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Font] is a late-binding token.
title: resolve(in:)
